ygData.subject: Re: mip = many innapropriate pictures?
ygData.msgSnippet: I get momentary pauses of maybe a tenth of a second or so when I turn these corners.  I don t think it s the textures for the buildings as much as player
ygData.messageBody:
I get momentary pauses of maybe a tenth of a second or so when I turn these
corners. I don't think it's the textures for the buildings as much as
player textures. There isn't really a noticeable pause when there's only 1
or 2 people by the bank, but if there's even 10 people, the pause is a lot
longer (relatively, it pauses maybe half a second.)

How much ram in on your video card? I have 32M.. that might be why my
pauses are shorter.. it keeps more textures in Ram.. just a thought.

> It also happens when I go to the FP bank. From the area where
> the jeweler and cleric's guild are, you have to go through a
> series of sharp turns to get to the bank area. I usually end
> up doing a 180 on that first turn, as the game loads in the
> info for the buildings in the new area.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
